description:
It`s Valentines Day, but does Kashiwada have anything for Oota?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kashiwada-san and Valentine`s Day / Tabuchi-san`s Melancholy / Oota-kun and White Day
Kashiwada-san to Valentine / Tabuchi-san to Yuuutsu / Oota-kun to White Day
柏田さんとバレンタイン / 田淵さんの憂鬱 / 太田君とホワイトデー
